content: HAS-V-36 Anchor rod High-performance anchor rod for injectable hybrid/epoxy anchors (carbon steel, ASTM F1554 grade 36, zinc-plated) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Custom lengths and additional diameters up to 2 available upon request Fully compliant with ASTM F1554 Free of oil and other contaminants for the highest performance with Hilti HIT adhesive anchoring systems Supplied complete with high-quality nuts with matching steel grade and thread tolerances for reliable performance Chamfered end ensures easy threading of the nut Applications Suitable for fastenings in concrete and masonry in combination with the relevant Hilti HIT adhesive anchoring systems Suitable for ductile fastening points with predictable steel failure in seismic-relevant applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry) | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2198033 -
